full_summary:
# Harbour Repairs Hay River, NT (East Channel)
==============================================

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-8123-29910682
* **Solicitation Number**: 30004620
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 22, 2023, at 14:00 ET
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 18, 2024

### Description of Work

A request for Qualification for the Harbour Repairs Hay River, NT (East Channel) project is issued by the Department of Fisheries and Oceans, Canada. The project involves the demolition of three existing steel buildings and other damaged harbour components. Additionally, the project encompasses the supply and installation of treated timber fenders, steel ladders, and other harbor improvements.

### Pre-Qualification Requirements

Bidders are required to meet the qualification requirements in the Request for Qualification document. All inquiries must be made in writing and submitted no less than seven (7) working days prior to the tender closing date to allow sufficient time for the contracting authority to respond.

### Attachments and Related Documents

The following documents are available on the [canadabuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8123/pr30004620_addendum-addenda-no.-1.pdf) website:

* Pr-30004620 – Addendum No. 1
* Pr-30004620 – Addendum No. 2
* Pr-30004620 – Addendum No. 3
* 30004620 – Request for Qualification – Harbour Repairs Hay River (East Channel) English
* 30004620 – Request for Qualification – Havre Améliorations de Hay River ( channel est - french)

### Contact Information

* Department of Fisheries and Oceans, Canada
* Contact Name: Paul Fortier
* Contact Phone: (343) 596-9926
* Contact Email: paul.fortier@dfo-mpo.gc.ca

Note that this is a requirement for vendors to respond to a Request for Qualification, not a formal Request for Proposal, but has key information required to bid if it were to be accepted as such.
